Migraine.description: Migraine is a neurological condition that causes intense headaches, often with nausea or sensitivity to light.
treatments: Rest in a quiet, dark room

Flu.description: Flu (influenza) is a viral infection that affects the respiratory system.

Asthma.description: Asthma is a chronic condition that affects the airways in the lungs.

Diabetes.description: Diabetes is a metabolic disorder that causes high blood sugar.
